programmes.show_description: Island Adventure: Stewie and Brian head out on an adventure to a giant floating garbage island in search of Stewie's tricycle, while Lois helps Quagmire find success dating.
Oh Brothel, Where Art Thou?: US animated comedy series. Stan goes to great lengths to get a plaque from a local historical society, and Roger becomes a travelling salesman.
Demolition Daddy: Snot discovers that his late father was a demolition derby driver who used to partner one of Roger's personas. Elsewhere, Hayley takes Steve on a road trip.
So You Stink You Can Dance: Animated comedy. Tina and Zeke go to watch when Jimmy Jr takes modern dance lessons at the recreation centre with an overbearing dance instructor.

programmes.show_name: New: The Real Housewives of Orange County
programmes.show_description: Reunion Part One: Reality show. The OC ladies come face-to-face for a dramatic reunion where Shannon confronts Tamra and Andy Cohen questions Tamra's behaviour.
The Chariot: Sitcom following three desperate young men in ancient Rome. The boys' fortunes might have taken a turn for the better after they win big at a chariot race.

Night Terrors: Animated adventures with Scooby and the gang. Snowed in by an avalanche, the Mystery Inc. gang take refuge in an old house filled with some very strange happenings.
The Midnight Zone: Animated adventures. When Cassidy is attacked by deep-sea robots, the gang decides to help her unravel the mystery of who is sending them and why.
Doo Not Disturb: Animated adventure series. A snowstorm forces the gang to check into a hotel run by a man who is very strict about the hotel rules established by his late mother.
Silver Scream: Animated adventure series. The gang tour a Hollywood studio and uncover a mystery concerning the ghost of a silent film comedy star intent on burying his final film!
Sharon Gaffka: TV personality Sharon Gaffka is given five menus, each of which has been put together by a potential blind date. Who will she want to see for seconds?

programmes.show_description: Reality series. It's the end of term for Nelly and Arthur, but there's already tears and tantrums on day one - could a family bike ride help smooth things over?
Reality series. Harry is heartbroken and turns to his mum Karen for support, and Joe and Junaid's relationship is blossoming as Junaid makes his feelings very clear.
Loose Lips: US reality series set in Florida. When Guerdy confides in Larsa that she has cancer, Larsa decides to repeat the news to her guests at Marcus' welcome home party.

programmes.show_name: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programmes.show_description: Bitter Pill to Swallow: US reality series. Kyle and Sutton unpack the group's dynamics while planning a trip to Spain, and Erika sets out to rebuild her career.

Pride Before the Fail: Hayley discovers she is within one credit of graduating college, but tries to fail so she can continue living at home.
